sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: BUDDH: Zhìyán (577-654), a monk in the lineage of Niútóu 牛頭

tls:text.tls:line: He then went on a travel (as intinerant monk) abroad.

sense.def: abroad

seg.line: 師舉：「古來老宿引俗官巡堂云：

tls:text.tls:srcline: 師舉：「古來老宿引俗官巡堂云：

sense.def: of ancient times

tls:text.tls:line: he then struck the a copper plate,

sense.def: strike, beat (e.g. a dog, a horse, one's breast, or indeed a bell)

tls:text.tls:line: All in the assembly got suddenly enlightened.

sense.def: be in attendance under the Buddhist pulprit

tls:text.tls:line: Do not spent your time in vain!

sense.def: light and shade > the flow of time > time
必也 "what is necessary" after topics other than personal names
不自由 "unfreiwillig handeln"; act on one's own initiative; be one's own master; act on your own accord; be autonomous; be independent from others, not rely on others
become independant

seg.line: 所以是非忻猒貫係不得脫折自由

tls:text.tls:srcline: 所以是非忻猒貫係不得脫折自由

sense.def: become independant

no matter whether V or not V, (in all cases)
